articles.title: Kim Jong Un Receives Reply from General Secretary of C.C., Communist Party of Vietnam
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Receives Reply from General Secretary of C.C., Communist Party of Vietnam
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a reply message from Nguyen Phu Trong, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Vietnam, on Mar. 9.
					 The message said:
					
					 I express my sincere thanks to you for sending a message of warm congratulations and friendship on the 85th anniversary of the founding of the Communist Party of Vietnam (February 3, 1930-February 3, 2015).
					
					 I am convinced that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the Communist Party of Vietnam and the Workers' Party of Korea provided and cultivated by President Ho Chi Minh and President Kim Il Sung would continue dynamically developing thanks to the efforts of both sides and the relations between Vietnam and the DPRK would grow more substantially and effectively in the interests of the peoples of both countries and for the cause of socialist construction, regional and world peace, stability and development.
					
					 I wish you good health and happiness and bigger successes in fulfilling your important responsibility.

articles.title: Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba Meets
articles.content:
Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba Meets
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba was held here Tuesday.
					 Present there were Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission who doubles as chairman of the Korean Committee for Solidarity with Cuba, So Ho Won, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and members of the committee.
					
					 Cuban Ambassador to the DPRK German Hermin Ferras Alvarez and his embassy officials were present there.
					
					 The meeting reviewed the work done by the committee over the past one year to boost the friendship and solidarity with the fraternal Cuban people in their dynamic struggle to protect the sovereignty of the country and socialist gains under the leadership of the Communist Party of Cuba. It discussed a working plan for this year.

articles.title: Delegation of Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport Back Home from Mongolia
articles.content:
Delegation of Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport Back Home from Mongolia
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport led by Minister Kang Jong Gwan returned home Tuesday after visiting Mongolia.

articles.title: Russian Ambassador Gives Reception
articles.content:
Russian Ambassador Gives Reception
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Matsegora gave a reception at his embassy on Tuesday to honor the 66th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreement on economic and cultural cooperation between the DPRK and the Russian Federation.
					 Present there on invitation were Ri Ryong Nam, minister of External Economic Relations, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Yun Hyok, vice-minister of Railways, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and chairman of the DPRK-Russia Friendship Association, and other officials concerned.

articles.title: All-People Resistance to Shatter U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces' Moves for Invasion of DPRK Called for
articles.content:
All-People Resistance to Shatter U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces' Moves for Invasion of DPRK Called for
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the North Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) issued a statement Tuesday to denounce the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises. 
					 The statement branded their reckless north-targeted war maneuvers as a grave act aimed at provoking a war at any cost and a blatant challenge to the aspiration and desire of all Koreans for peace and reunification.
					
					 If the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces persist in the moves for confrontation and war, they will lead to a nuclear war, it noted.
					
					 Now is the time for all Koreans to turn out in the all-people resistance against the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces in order to defuse the danger of a war, it said.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. imperialist aggressors and the south Korean puppet forces clearly face up to the ever-mounting Korean nation's resistance to the U.S. and stop at once the north-targeted joint military exercises and moves for escalating confrontation.
					
					 It said that Pomminryon would take the lead in the sacred war of justice to defuse the danger of a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula and achieve the peace and independent reunification of the country hand in hand with all Koreans at home and abroad.
					
					 It stressed that the entire Korean nation including organizations of people of all social standings in south Korea and overseas should rise up in the patriotic struggle for reunification to resolutely smash the moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for confrontation and war moves, safeguard the peace of the country and the security of the nation and bring about great changes and innovations in the inter-Korean relations this significant year marking the 15th anniversary of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation to open up a wide avenue to independent reunification.

articles.title: National Meeting of Sportspersons to Be Held
articles.content:
National Meeting of Sportspersons to Be Held
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The 7th national meeting of sportspersons will be held in Pyongyang late in March.
					 It will be held in an exciting period when the general advance is underway to build a highly civilized socialist nation under the wise guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un. It will review the achievements and experience gained in the sports field and the lesson drawn in the past and discuss the tasks and ways for putting the nation's physical culture and sports on the world level at an early date.
					
					 It will bring together sportspersons and coaches of merits and officials in the sports field and relevant units.

articles.title: Modernization of Footwear Industry Brisk in DPRK
articles.content:
Modernization of Footwear Industry Brisk in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Shoes factories in the DPRK have paid big efforts to technical modernization of production processes.
					 The Wonsan Shoes Factory is taking the lead in the campaign.
					
					 The factory has put its management on IT basis, based on completed modernization of its production processes, thus laying a firm foundation to increase the production.
					
					 The Ryuwon Shoes Factory is paying primary attention to introducing high-performance machines and establishing integrated production system to produce multi-variety, diverse and multi-color shoes.
					
					 Meanwhile, it has been actively pushed forward at most shoes factories to increase the ratio of localization of raw materials and equipment.
					
					 The Pyongyang Shoes Machine Factory has made praiseworthy achievements in manufacturing shoemaking equipment on its own.
					
					 Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's field guidance to the Ryuwon and Wonsan shoes factories in January this year marked a milestone in developing the country's footwear industry.

articles.title: Mental Arithmetic Widely Introduced to Education in DPRK
articles.content:
Mental Arithmetic Widely Introduced to Education in DPRK
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A brisk work to apply the mental arithmetic in teaching has been conducted at primary schools in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Taking the lead in this work are schools in Tongdaewon District, Pyongyang.
					
					 The District School for Teachers' In-service Training systematized the principles of mental arithmetic into various categories in line with the intellectual level and psychology of pupils. And it found out a way for the pupils to master the mental arithmetic in a short time before generalizing it among primary schools in the district.
					
					 In particular, Tongdaewon and Samma primary schools in the district created advanced teaching methods on the basis of the principles of mental arithmetic and conducted the extracurricular education among pupils with the methods for one hour every day.
					
					 As a result, the pupils' cogitative faculty was considerably improved in several months and the rate of honor pupils at the schools increased from 70 percent to 98 percent. 
					
					 The introduction of mental arithmetic in teaching is helpful to improving the nation's general education.

articles.title: New Compound Fertilizer Production Process Goes Operational at Hungnam Fertilizer Complex
articles.content:
New Compound Fertilizer Production Process Goes Operational at Hungnam Fertilizer Complex
Hamhung, March 17 (KCNA) -- A new process of producing compound fertilizer went operational at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex in South Hamgyong Province of the DPRK.
					 The fertilizer, a compound of urea fertilizer produced through coal gasification process and several kinds of microelements such as zeolite, potassium and silicon rich in the country, is efficient for the growth of the crops and useful for improving acidified land.
					
					 A large amount of fertilizer is being produced every day and supplied to several units of the agricultural field.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Revolutionary Soldier Spirit
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Learning from Revolutionary Soldier Spirit
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 18th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "On Learning from the Revolutionary Soldier Spirit."
					 The work, published on March 17, Juche 86 (1997), deals with such issues as to learn from the spirit of the service personnel by following the example set by them in their struggle and art activities, perform in a frontline style party information and agitation and intensify the education of party members and other people in revolutionary faith and will and clarifies tasks and ways to learn from the revolutionary soldier spirit.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 The past 18 years since the publication of the work represent a proud period in which the inexhaustible might of the revolutionary soldier spirit has been fully displayed. 
					
					 The spirit, the core of which are the spirit of devotedly protecting the leader, the spirit of devotedly implementing the Party's policies and the heroic self-sacrificing spirit, is the noble spirit symbolizing and representing the Songun era. It serves as a mighty ideological weapon that prepares all the service personnel and people as performers of heroic feats.
					
					 The revolutionary soldier spirit serves as a powerful engine to help all the service personnel and people become fighters strong in ideology and faith who are boundlessly loyal to the party and the leader. It has become a fundamental source that fills the great socialist family with revolutionary comradeship and sense of obligation.
					
					 It also serves as a militant banner that encourages all to fully demonstrate their spirit of patriotic devotion in the sacred struggle for the country and its people.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Denounces Key Resolve and Foal Eagle as Saber-Rattling against DPRK
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Denounces Key Resolve and Foal Eagle as Saber-Rattling against DPRK
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are accusing the DPRK of what they call "provocation from it" and the "escalation of tension". They are, at the same time, letting  loose a spate of rubbish that Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills would contribute to "stability" on the Korean peninsula in a bid to justify their war moves.
					 Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in an article terms the joint military drills as typical saber-rattling to invade the DPRK.
					
					 Their joint military drills are no more than the most serious threat to the peace as they are the root cause of escalating the tension and the danger of war on the peninsula, the article notes, adding:
					
					 It is evidenced by the criminal history of ceaseless war drills staged against the north in south Korea for the past several decades.
					
					 Team Spirit joint military exercises were a curtain raiser to Key Resolve and Foal Eagle. Team Spirit was staged from the 1970s to the early 1990s. It was the largest-ever test nuclear war and preliminary war as it was staged for several months with hundreds of thousands of aggressor forces, nuclear carriers, strategic bombers and various other nuclear war means involved.
					
					 They staged RSOI from 1994. RSOI and Foal Eagle joint military drills were replaced by Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills from 2008.
					
					 The sinister scenario of the U.S. to stifle the DPRK by force and establish military domination over the whole of Korea was intensively revealed by Key Resolve and Foal Eagle.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces are misleading public opinion at home and abroad. But with such poor advertisement they can never justify Key Resolve and Foal Eagle, the nuclear war drills whose most dangerous nature is disclosed by history and reality.

articles.title: Papers Flay Reckless Remarks of Confrontational Maniac
articles.content:
Papers Flay Reckless Remarks of Confrontational Maniac
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- On March 10, Jong Jong Uk, vice-chairman of the south Korean puppet preparatory committee for unification, opened to public the fact that there existed "a team for unification lacking agreement and unification of social systems" in the "preparatory committee for unification" and confessed that they were preparing in secret "other form of unification without south-north agreement" and other organization in the regime was also studying the "unification of social systems."
					 Commenting on this, papers Tuesday say:
					
					 Jong was censured by public opinion for his reckless tongue-wagging but this was by no means an accidental gaffe made by the confrontational maniac.
					
					 There are not a few maniacs in south Korea who are inciting north-south confrontation while opening to public the logic of "unification of social systems", Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 The "preparatory committee for unification" was set up by the puppet chief executive in July last year involving the Cabinet, "National Assembly" and NGOs under the pretext of the "confidence-building pursuant to confidence-building process", "exchange and cooperation" and "peaceful unification".
					
					 The puppet forces' operation of such sinister plot-breeding body in broad daylight means clear denial of the ideology and social system of the DPRK and, at the same time, an unpardonable anti-reunification criminal act of reneging on all agreements reached between the north and the south till now.
					
					 Great irony is that the group of traitors who are no more than U.S. colonial stooges forsaken by the people and driven into an abyss of ruin are foolishly seeking to bring down the inviolable social system of the DPRK.
					
					 We would like to warn those idiots once again that their scenario for "unification through absorption" is nothing but a daydream.
					
					 Minju Joson says that Park Geun Hye should give a clear and responsible clarification of those outbursts, make apology for them before the entire nation and dissolve the "committee" at once.

articles.title: Papers Lay Bare U.S. Purpose of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Papers Lay Bare U.S. Purpose of Escalating Tension on Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is deliberately pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to the worst phase. It is aimed to secure a pretext for carrying out its aggressive and predatory foreign policy. Papers on Tuesday say this in commentaries.
					 It is a calculation of the U.S. that it can dominate the world only when it exercises its unchallenged influence on Asia-Pacific, on Northeast Asia, in particular, Rodong Sinmun notes, and goes on:
					
					 Therefore, the U.S. is directing the pivot of its foreign policy to this region and advanced the pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy. 
					
					 But there are big powers capable of challenging the U.S. in the region. Therefore, it is impossible to dominate the Asia-Pacific region unless the U.S. contains those countries.
					
					 The U.S. seeks to achieve this aim by a military method.
					
					 This has touched off due caution and resistance of big powers in the region.
					
					 The U.S. requires a pretext for calming down the vigilance of big powers in the region and justifying its actions. Precisely for this reason the U.S. is deliberately escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is a daydream for the U.S. to calculate that it can dominate the Asia-Pacific region by making the DPRK a scapegoat. 
					
					 Minju Joson says that the DPRK can never remain an onlooker to the moves of the U.S. to make the Korean peninsula a victim of its Asia-Pacific rebalancing strategy.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Authorities' Moves to Deploy THAAD in S. Korea under Fire
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Monday posted an editorial slamming the U.S. and south Korean authorities for their moves to deploy THAAD in south Korea.
					 The U.S. forces officially stated they surveyed in advance the place where THAAD is to be set up, the editorial said, and went on:
					
					 A deputy secretary of the U.S. Defense admitted this in September last year.
					
					 What is deplorable is that the U.S. surveyed the site for THAAD without any prior consent of the south Korean regime. 
					
					 The editorial protested the deployment of THAAD being pressed for under the pretext of "missile threats from the north".

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Regime Accused of Abusing Punishment of U.S. Ambassador for Their Sinister Purpose
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Regime Accused of Abusing Punishment of U.S. Ambassador for Their Sinister Purpose
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency issued a report on Tuesday denouncing the U.S. and the south Korean puppet group for making desperate efforts to abuse the knife attack on the U.S. ambassador in Seoul for their political purpose. 
					 It went on:
					
					 Since the knife attack on the U.S. ambassador, the U.S. has become vocal about the strengthening of alliance with south Korea. This is an undisguised move seeking a sinister intention to increase the position and role of the U.S. ambassador as a colonial governor general and turn south Korea into an advance base for carrying out the U.S. strategy to dominate the world by keeping it under permanent occupation.
					
					 Lurking behind the Park Geun Hye puppet group's call for strengthening the alliance with the U.S. is a despicable intention to curry favor with the U.S. ambassador, a confidant of Obama, through flattery and tone down the daily mounting anti-U.S. sentiment, the strong resolution to achieve independence and the struggle against the regime.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group can never get out of its wretched plight as a colonial stooge as long as south Korea is under the U.S. colonial rule. 
					
					 The attack on the U.S. ambassador was a manifestation of the south Korean public resentment and resistance against the U.S. pushing the inter-Korean relations into a catastrophe through nuclear war drills for invading the DPRK. 
					
					 World media also commented that the knife attack made by Kim Ki Jong was the consequence caused by the U.S.-south Korea war drills.
					
					 However, the south Korean puppet group blamed the DPRK by terming this case "action taken by the forces following the north". By doing so, the group seeks a sinister aim to evade the disgrace and shame it has suffered before the international community and stamp out the pro-reunification forces at any cost by availing itself of this opportunity.
					
					 The report went on:
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces brought charges of "attempted murder" and "terrorism" against Kim Ki Jong who meted out a punishment of justice to the U.S. ambassador, unable to repress the national resentment at the U.S. increasing the danger of a war on the Korean peninsula by staging dangerous joint military exercises in south Korea. Not content with this, they are labeling his deed "action taken by the forces following the north" and the "one wire-pulled by backstage forces" in a bid to shift the blame for the case onto others. This is unpardonable sycophancy, act of treachery and anti-reunification and confrontation hysteria.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are expressing irrepressible resentment at the U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group escalating the anti-DPRK provocations with the knife attack on the U.S. ambassador as a momentum and renewing their firm will to mercilessly wipe out the enemies.
					
					 We have already clarified its resolute will not to pardon those hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its inviolable political system dearer than our lives but to wipe out them to the last man. 
					
					 We together with all other Koreans will never tolerate the reckless acts of the U.S. and anti-reunification confrontational maniacs but resolutely react against them.

articles.title: Disorganization of Anti-reunification Mechanism Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Disorganization of Anti-reunification Mechanism Demanded in S. Korea
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Taejon Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration held a press conference on March 12 in demand of the disorganization of the south Korean puppet preparatory committee for unification.
					 Speakers said at the press conference that Jong Jong Uk, vice-chairman of the south Korean puppet preparatory committee for unification, opened to public the fact that there existed "a team for unification lacking agreement and unification of social systems" in the "preparatory committee for unification".
					
					 They went on:
					
					 His outbursts shock the public as the Park Geun Hye regime is talking about "the doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification" but, in actuality, making preparations for "unification through absorption."
					
					 To cry out for achieving "unification through absorption" under the situation where political and military confrontation and tension have escalated since the emergence of the present regime is a dangerous call for bringing the disaster of war to the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Jong's remarks clearly laid bare the true colors of the present regime talking about "confidence-building process" and the above-said committee.
					
					 The speakers demanded that the "committee" be disbanded at once.

articles.title: Japanese Personage Condemns U.S.-S. Korea Military Drills
articles.content:
Japanese Personage Condemns U.S.-S. Korea Military Drills
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, posted an article slamming the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills for invading the DPRK on its website on Feb. 23. 
					 The article said:
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills now being staged by the U.S. and south Korean authorities are aimed at invading the DPRK.
					
					 It is act of treachery for the south Korean authorities to persistently stage together with outsiders the war drills targeting the compatriots in the north.
					
					 Those military rehearsals are a product of the U.S. policy to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. remains unchanged its scenario for stifling the DPRK.
					
					 The south Korean authorities and puppet army are no more than bullet shields for the U.S.
					
					 Nobody can vouch that the saber-rattling which will last till April 24 will not develop into an actual war any time.
					
					 He urged the south Korean chief executive to stop toeing outsiders' policies but respond to the fair and aboveboard proposals advanced by the DPRK for peace and reunification on the Korean peninsula.

articles.title: Japanese Urges S. Korean Authorities to Repeal SL
articles.content:
Japanese Urges S. Korean Authorities to Repeal SL
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Takashi Nada, representative of the Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan, posted an article titled "We demand south Korean authorities repeal 'Security Law' (SL)" on a website on February 28.
					 The SL has been used as a means for perpetuating the national division and supporting the fascist dictatorship by the successive ruling quarters since its fabrication in December, 1948, the article said, and went on:
					
					 We can hardly repress astonishment at the existence of such evil law even in the 21st century.
					
					 What is more surprising is that there is the "government" trampling down the people by invoking this law.
					
					 This reminds one of militarist Japan and fascist Germany.
					
					 The south Korean authorities are using the SL for labeling progressive political parties, organizations and personages as the "forces following the north" and "pro-communists."
					
					 The north and the south of Korea confirmed in the July 4 joint statement and the June 15 joint declaration that they would achieve reunification on the basis of not infringing upon the other party's ideology and social system.
					
					 The inter-Korean joint statement and declarations reflect the aspiration and desire of the Korean nation.
					
					 However, Park Geun Hye insists on "unification of social systems."
					
					 This would only escalate confrontation between the north and the south.
					
					 The SL is being used for suppressing the organizations and personages calling for peace and reunification and seeking "unification of social systems." This is an act of treachery challenging the aspiration and desire of the Korean nation.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities abrogate the SL for independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Student's Campaign Declared in Japan
articles.content:
Student's Campaign Declared in Japan
Tokyo, March 16 (KNS-KCNA) -- A meeting was held in Osaka, Japan to declare the start of students' campaign across the country.
					 The student's campaign to last untill September 12 is sponsored by "We will not tolerate Japan's distortion of history! The Liaison Council of Korean Students in Japan". It is part of the work to mark the 70th anniversary of the Union of Korean Students in Japan.
					
					 Present at the meeting were members of the union in different parts of Japan, Koreans in Japan and Japanese students and personages.
					
					 It heard testimonies by bereaved families of victims to indict the Japanese imperialists for their forcible drafting of Koreans.
					
					 Speakers denounced the ultra-right forces for their wrong understanding and groundless distortion of history as evidenced by their justification of Japan's past history of aggression.
					
					 There took place a drama staged by members of the Union of Korean Students in Japan clearly showing the horrible massacres of Koreans by the Japanese imperialists and the blood-stained history that can neither be justified nor concealed.
					
					 An action program was read out at the meeting to vow to carry on the struggle in different parts of Japan in protest against the distortion of history.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Russia
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed by "Jongilbong" Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Ulyanovsk Region on March 12.
					 Aleksandr Kruglikov, chairman of the association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events to praise the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung from March 12 to April 17.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Poland
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Poland
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- A Polish preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was inaugurated in Warsaw on Mar. 11.
					 Slaboy January Guzowski, chairman of the Central Committee of the Poland-Korea Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events including a seminar on revolutionary life and exploits of Kim Il Sung on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association Denounces U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association released a bulletin on March 10.
					 The bulletin censured the U.S.-south Korea joint military drills Key Resolve and Foal Eagle and carried the statements made by a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army and a spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK to clarify its stand on them.

articles.title: Bulgarian Body Laud Righteous Deed of S. Korean
articles.content:
Bulgarian Body Laud Righteous Deed of S. Korean
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association carried a commentary titled "Reunification is the desire of the Korean people" in its bulletin on Mar. 10.
					 The commentary referred to the fact that the world media gave publicity to the knife attack on the U.S. ambassador in Seoul by south Korean Kim Ki Jong and that the south Korean authorities threw him behind bars as he called for reunification and protested against war.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 It is clear that Kim's deed is not a crime, objectively.
					
					 He showed the U.S., who divided Korea into two, and the south Korean authorities the Korean nation's struggle to live as the one nation in a reunified country.
					
					 The Korean people want to shape its destiny on its own without interference by foreign forces.
					
					 Such a righteous protest as Kim's despite the suppression by the authorities is not the first time in south Korea.
					
					 We remember many just struggles fought in south Korea such as the April 19 Uprising in which south Koreans toppled the Syngman Rhee regime and the Kwangju Popular Uprising.
					
					 Therefore, the recent attack on the U.S. ambassador should never be taken as a crime but a protest against the U.S. policy and military presence in south Korea, a stumbling block lying in the way of the Korean nation's reunification.
					
					 How can the people live in peace wherever the U.S. troops are stationed.

articles.title: Koreans in Australia Stage Solidarity Demo
articles.content:
Koreans in Australia Stage Solidarity Demo
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Australia staged a demonstration in Sydney on March 13 in demand of the resignation of the Park Geun Hye regime. 
					 The demonstrators shouted slogans calling for the resignation of Park.
					
					 A statement was read out.
					
					 It termed the Park regime an illegal one.
					
					 Park seized power through an unprecedented election rigging with the Intelligence Service, Army Cyber Command and other power organs involved, it charged. 
					
					 The people's life is being ruthlessly trampled down by the Park regime, a center for hatching plots and making fabrications, it held.
					
					 The statement underscored the need to fight it out in solidarity with world people to seek the resignation of the Park regime, cesspool of all ills and social evils.

articles.title: German Organization Protests against Anti-DPRK Moves of S. Korean Authorities
articles.content:
German Organization Protests against Anti-DPRK Moves of S. Korean Authorities
Pyongyang, March 17 (KCNA) -- The German branch of the Korean Friendship Association (KFA) sent a letter to the south Korean puppet embassy in Berlin on Mar. 12 in protest against the south Korean puppet forces' moves against the DPRK.
					 The letter said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities kicked off adventurous joint military exercises together with the U.S., turning down the DPRK's fair and aboveboard proposals for peace on the Korean peninsula and opting for confrontation.
					
					 They are also busy with despicable anti-DPRK "human rights" racket.
					
					 This resulted in further straining the inter-Korean relations and aggravating the regional situation.
					
					 The German branch of the KFA urges the south Korean authorities and the U.S. to stop all conspiratorial moves and respond to the DPRK's just proposals.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities stop at once their moves to stifle the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de Nguyen Phu Trong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de respuesta de Nguyen Phu Trong
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ACNC) -- El Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Kim Jong Un, recibio el mensaje de respuesta que le dirigiera el dia 9 el Secretario General del Comite Central del Partido Comunista de Vietnam, Nguyen Phu Trong.
					La misiva senala como sigue:
					
					Expreso sincero agradecimiento a Vd. por haberme enviado un mensaje de calidas felicitaciones y sentimiento de amistad con motivo del 85o aniversario de la fundacion del PCV (El 3 de febrero de 1930 - El 3 de febrero de 2015).
					
					Estamos convencidos de que gracias a los esfuerzos de ambas partes, se desarrollaran continuamente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre el PCV y el PTC, preparadas y desarrolladas por el Presidente Ho Chi Minh y el Presidente Kim Il Sung, y se fomentaran sustancial y eficientemente los vinculos entre Vietnam y Corea para los intereses de los pueblos de ambos paises, la causa de construccion socialista y la paz, la estabilidad y el desarrollo de la region y el mundo.
					
					Deseo que Vd. tenga buena salud y felicidad y obtenga mayores exitos en el cumplimiento de sus cargos responsables.

articles.title: Sesionada reunion anual del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba
articles.content:
Sesionada reunion anual del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy en esta capital la reunion anual del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba.
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion Kim Sung Du, presidente del Comite de Educacion y del Comite Coreano de Solidaridad con Cuba, So Ho Won, vicepresidente del Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero, y los miembros del comite solidario.
					
					Asistieron ademas el embajador German Hermin Ferras Alvarez y otros integrantes de la sede diplomatica cubana en Corea.
					
					La reunion hizo balance de lo que hizo el comite durante un ano transcurrido para profundizar la amistad y solidaridad con el hermano pueblo cubano, que bajo la direccion del Partido Comunista de Cuba, lucha intensamente por defender la soberania del pais y las conquistas del socialismo, y discutio el plan de trabajo del presente ano.

articles.title: Portavoz de Direccion Nortena de la APRP condena ejercicios en Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Portavoz de Direccion Nortena de la APRP condena ejercicios en Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz de la Direccion Nortena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) hizo publica el dia 17 una declaracion para condenar los ejercicios militares conjuntos Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Los aventureros ejercicios de los agresores norteamericanos y los belicistas surcoreanos constituyen una grave provocacion para desatar a toda costa la guerra y un desafio a la aspiracion y deseo de todos los coreanos sobre la paz y la reunificacion.
					
					Asi senala el documento y prosigue:
					
					Si EE.UU. y la banda titere surcoreana siguen recurriendo a la confrontacion y la guerra, estas pasaran inevitablemente a la guerra nuclear.
					
					Ahora es el tiempo en que toda la nacion coreana debe levantarse en la resistencia pannacional contra EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos para prevenir el peligro de guerra.
					
					Los agresores norteamericanos y la banda surcoreana deben ver correctamente la cada dia mas fuerte resistencia antiyanqui y parar ahora mismo sus maniobras belicas y campana conflictiva contra la parte connacional.
					
					La APRP estrechara las manos con todos los coreanos dentro y fuera del pais y estara al frente de la justa y sagrada lucha por eliminar el peligro de guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana y por la paz y reunificacion independiente del pais.
					
					Toda la nacion coreana, inclusive las entidades de diferentes sectores en el Sur de Corea y en ultramar, debe sumarse a la lucha patriotica para frustrar tajantemente la campana de confrontacion y guerra del imperialismo norteamericano y la banda titere surcoreana.
					
					Asi debera defender la paz del pais y la seguridad de la nacion y abrir el ancho camino de la reunificacion independiente al lograr gran cambio en las relaciones intercoreanas en el presente ano en que se cumplen el 15o aniversario de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y el 70o de la Liberacion de la Patria.

articles.title: Se efectuara conferencia nacional de deportistas
articles.content:
Se efectuara conferencia nacional de deportistas
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar en la segunda quincena de este mes en esta capital la 7a conferencia nacional de deportistas.
					En ese conclave, que se efectuara en el tiempo conmovedor cuando se desarrolla la marcha general para adelantar la construccion de un Estado civilizado socialista bajo la sabia orientacion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, se hara balance de los exitos, experiencias y lecciones logrados anteriormente en la rama deportiva y se discutiran las tareas y remedios por situar cuanto antes el deporte nacional en el nivel mundial.
					
					Tomaran parte en la ocasion los jugadores, entrenadores y funcionarios ameritados del sector deportivo y las unidades vinculadas.

articles.title: ACNC publica informacion sobre malempleo del caso de castigo a embajador norteamericano
articles.content:
ACNC publica informacion sobre malempleo del caso de castigo a embajador norteamericano
Pyongyang, 17 de marzo (ACNC) -- Para condenar a Estados Unidos y las autoridades surcoreanas que intentan desesperadamente emplear en sus objetivos politicos el caso de castigo al embajador norteamericano ocurrido recientemente en Seul, la Agencia Central Noticias de Corea hizo publica el dia 17 una informacion.
					Despues del incidente, EE.UU. habla mas que nunca sobre el fortalecimiento de la alianza con el Sur de Corea, revela la nota citando datos y continua:
					
					Eso es un movimiento que parte de la siniestra intencion de consolidar, a traves del fortalecimiento de la alianza EE.UU.-Sur de Corea, la posicion y el papel del embajador norteamericano acreditado en el Sur de Corea como gobernador general de esta colonia y de ocupar perennemente el suelo surcoreano para convertirlo en la base avanzada para el cumplimiento de la estrategia de hegemonia mundial.
					
					Por su parte, la banda titere de Park Geun-hye habla tambien de la consolidacion de la alianza con EE.UU. para adular al "gobernador general", colaborador cercano de Obama, y calmar la lucha antiyanqui y antigubernamental por la independencia.
					
					Mientras continue la dominacion colonial de EE.UU., los titeres surcoreanos nunca podran liberarse de su miserable situacion de lacayo colonial.
					
					La punalada sufrida por el embajador norteamericano es una manifestacion de la colera y protesta unanimes de los habitantes surcoreanos contra EE.UU. que lleva las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase catastrofica librando los ejercicios de guerra nuclear contra la RPDC.
					
					Los medios de distintos paises del mundo evaluan tambien que el asalto de Kim Ki Jong es un resultado de los ejercicios militares EE.UU.-Sur de Corea.
					
					Sin embargo, la banda de los titeres surcoreanos vincula el caso con la RPDC diciendo que fue "obra de las fuerzas seguidoras al Norte", para reducir la verguenza sufrida en la arena internacional y aprovechar el incidente para exterminar las fuerzas del movimiento por la reunificacion.
					
					Es imperdonable acto servil a grandes potencias, conflictivo y anti-reunificacion acusar de "conato de asesinato" y "terrorismo" al habitante quien ejecuto ese castigo justiciero impotente de aguantar el odio a EE.UU. que agrava la crisis de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana desarrollando en el Sur de Corea los peligrosos ejercicios militares.
					
					Para imputar la responsabilidad del incidente,  la camarilla surcoreana describe el caso como "obra de las fuerzas seguidoras al Norte" e insiste en que fue orquestado por las "fuerzas que estan detras".
					
					Ahora, el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC estan indignados por EE.UU. y la banda de Park Geun-hye, que recrudecen la campana provocativa anti-RPDC vinculandola con el incidente de castigo, y redoblan la determinacion de aniquilarlos despiadadamente.
					
					Hemos declarado ya nuestra voluntad de eliminar a los que se atrevan a atentar contra la maxima dignidad, mas valiosa que la vida, y el sagrado regimen politico de la RPDC.
					
					No perdonaremos jamas la locura de EE.UU. y los elementos conflictivos anti-reunificacion y les haremos frente rotundo junto con toda la nacion.
